short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension that manages bookmarks and finds the best time to remind you to revisit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bookmarks are meant to be consumed, not clog up your browser as an open tab.

Save tabs and ACTUALLY remember to visit them.
 
💡 Simply save a tab and keep working
 
See an interesting article or video suggestion while researching something? Queue the tab with Pondr and alleviate the pressure of having to remember to view it later.
 
💡 Relieve the mental toll of planning
 
With the Google Calendar™ integration, all you need to do is pick the tab you want to save, we'll do find the time for you. No more combing through your schedule and setting an alarm/reminder.

💡 Clutter Free Bookmark Manager

Nothing's worse than an endless list of bookmarks or too many tabs open at once. It's hard to look at and a pain to comb through. Pondr's clutter-free tab display gives you simple oversight of what matters. View tabs in a grid view or list view.


💡 An easier way to remember deadlines
 
Have a job application or assignment deadline coming up? Queue the submission page to the specific date, and the tab will reappear on the day it's due! 

 
💡 Save and view all corners of the internet
 
Pondr can be accessed anywhere within the Chrome browser. From articles, videos and anything else under the (digital) sun.

💡 Stop emailing yourself links
 
Access Pondr on any page just by opening the pop-up. Now you can spend more time doing work while queuing up all of your favorite articles to read later.

 

Instead of keeping open tabs or making tons of bookmarks for tasks, you hope to do later, easily save articles, videos, or any webpage on your browser while simultaneously scheduling the reminder with only one click. 
Your tabs will miraculously appear when it's show time🕺! Get back to what's important and your tabs will be patiently waiting for you out of sight!

For users with Google Calendar™, connecting with Pondr allows you to take reminders a step further by automatically finding the best time to remind you to revisit your bookmark. Pondr identifies the best time to remind you based off certain criteria in your calendar such as open time slots.

Here’s some of Pondr’s key features:

⚡ Automated bookmark reminders
Simply hit the Pondr button on a tab you want to save for later and Pondr will find the best time to remind you via your Google Calendar

🎨Customizable Preset Reminders
Have a frequent time you’re available? Simply turn it into a preset reminder time to assist your tab management

📌 Pinned Tabs
Not all tabs are meant to be visited only once! Pondr lets you speed dial into the websites or apps you use on a daily basis.


🔍 Search for Tabs
Get instant access to the tabs you need to get the job done. Pondr is able to search for any website inside your library, letting you find exactly what you’re looking for in seconds.

📅 Agenda View
Get actionable oversight of what’s coming up today with Agenda View. You don’t need to be bombarded with every single bookmark you’ve queued just when you want to see whats upcoming.

🗓️ Reschedule Reminders
Something come up? Seamlessly reschedule your tab for another day within your library.

⌨️ Keyboard Shortcuts
Easily Pondr a tab without touching your mouse!

✅ Private Library
Passcode-protected library for sensitive tabs and data

---------
